name: FINA SNAKE DRESS

description: The dyeing process of the yarn used to make this style uses 40% less water than conventional methods

RWS certified wool (CU 870616). The Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) is an industry tool that ensures the wool comes from farms where the land has been managed and the sheep have been treated responsibly - find out more
